channel.title: Help me please the game is taking too long
channel.description:
#### What happened? I bought Throne of Lies on Steam and launched it. The game needed my Email to let me through after I signed in through steam and it doesn't stop.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? It was supposed to let me play the game
#### Steps to reproduce: idk #### Comments: idk if this is because of my computer or not, also here's a screenshot ![TOL%20GLITCH|576x309](upload://ksJVTm6vMfJZVNFHNgIsKsRXUQT.PNG)

item.title: Help me please the game is taking too long
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Hi there, this is not a usual case – I responded to you on Discord. I need to see your logs to see what happened:

(orange line)

  • Are you in Russia?
  • Do you have unique characters in your email?
  • Do you have a REALLY LONG or REALLY SHORT email?
  • Did you try an alternate email?

Logs would tell me exactly what happened, though.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me please the game is taking too long
